content.rendered:
Help Make Music—Become A Donor

Join with all of these people in supporting the unique vision of Pacific Serenades.

Ticket sales cover less than half of the costs of our concerts. Thus, it is the generosity of our donors that makes Pacific Serenades possible. All contributions are fully tax-deductible.

If you would like information on becoming a Pacific Serenades donor, please call (213) 534-3434, email us, or write to:

Pacific Serenades
Los Angeles Center Studios
1201 W 5th Street F 224A
Los Angeles, CA 90017

Distinguished Benefactor

($10,000 & above)

Sterling Benefactor

($5,000-$9,999)

Esterházy Circle

($2,500-$4,999)

Artist’s Sponsor

($1,500-$2,499)

Benefactor

($1,000-$1,499)

Patron

($500-$999)

Sustaining

($250-$499)

Sponsor

($100-$249)

Donor

($50-$99)

Friend

($35-$49)

Contributor

(under $35)
